location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Political Department letter no. 17 from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Reporting that the baggage and suite belonging to the Mission [to Tehran] had been landed safely from the Byramgoreand that the ship had been allowed to return to Bombay.
